

1) 

# cat /proc/net/softnet_stat
O/p - 
000940c7 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
0000ee2a 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
00012aa8 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
0001a3bb 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
00011cde 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000

# Format of /proc/net/softnet_stat:
#
# column 1 : received frames
# column 2 : dropped
# column 3 : time_squeeze
# column 4-8: all zeros
# column 9 : cpu_collision
# column 10 : received_rps
# column 11 : flow_limit_count
 
 
2) # cat /sys/class/net/ethPhy0/carrier_up_count
O/p - count

3)  # cat /sys/class/net/ethPhy0/carrier_down_count
O/p - count

4)  # cat /sys/class/net/ethPhy0/carrier
O/p - 

5)
